website_summaries.verdict: This rugged Apple Watch case is sure to serve you well for an extended period of time.
pros: Shock-absorbing case guarantees your Apple Watch is protected against bumps, dents, and dings
Snap-on design ensures you can instantly install the case on your Apple Watch
Case fits a variety of Apple Watch models perfectly
Provides full access to an Apple Watch's touch screen, camera, ports, and buttons
cons: Not intended for use with 38 mm Apple Watch models

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one I bought, first one broke after almost ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I bought, first one broke after almost two years of daily use. I can't use the normal sport band that comes with the apple watch. This one is very durable and very protective. I work in a warehouse, constantly banging it on steel shelving units, and never had any issues. Will buy a third when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Cost, Looks and hopefully durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these products since first purchasing my Apple Watch. I purchased one of the most expensive models which was waterproof and more recently, one of the less expensive models. The most expensive was good although not worth the price, the least expensive one, let just say I was fortunate that every time the claspe allowed my watch to slip off of my wrist I was able to find it and the case saved it from damage. This is the best of four that I have purchased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: daggert

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, what you see on the picture is not what you get... On the picture it looks like different material and there is a differentiation between the silver and black.. There is not, it is not shiny. It is all on piece of matte black material. No silver whatsoever. For the money it is a decent band functionally. But heed the warning, it does not look like the pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Scot Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case and good look!
customer_reviews.text: It works just as it should. Protects the watch efficently (I work on a construction site and I can assure you that the cover has already got some big hits, but nothing that the supcase can't resist. You need to know that as this is for protection to the apple watch, it gives the watch a bigger and chubbier look, which I love, but it depends on the people's likes.
customer_reviews.author: Gianmarco Dominici

customer_reviews.title: Be carefull if you have a screen protector
customer_reviews.text: It’s durable product but beware if you have a screw protector. I bought a screen protector and no matter how I insert the case, it will pinch the corner of the screen protector it may work if you buy a smaller screen protector that doesn’t cover the edges of the watch. I didn’t want to take a chance of it ruining another screen protector so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Waste Of Money--Keeps Watch From Charging
customer_reviews.text: Product description says, "Made specifically with the 42 mm Apple Watch in mind, the UB Pro won’t interfere with any features, buttons or overall functionality of the device." Not so. If you use an adapter to keep the charging unit vertical so it can be used in night stand mode, the watch will not charge. This is because the case prevents the watch back from sitting snugly against the charging unit. It is also large and really looks bulky on the wrist. Just another disappointing product that looks good until you actually try to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and wasn't the band that is advertised. What arrived is an extemely cheap knockoff. If you are thinking about buying this be warned. You will not get the watch band made by supcase or shown in the listing. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Alprin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If you ever purchased one of these and it is broke you will have to pay at least $20 to return it it is not worth it I am very pissed off at this point I spent a lot of money with AMAZON and I do not agree with this at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken West

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This adds some style and individuality to my Apple Watch. My wrist kept hitting the button before I got this case. The reason I wanted this case was because the button was recessed in the case. Protects the button with it still being accessible. Case fits fine with a screen protector and raised edges increase the protection. Case and band are very sturdy. My son bought one based on mine and I will be ordering another in blue. Very easy to install, very secure and protects my watch from bumping into door frames, bumping getting in and out of cars etcetera. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ruhtra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: Fail. How do you mass produce a case for a watch that has the only pronounced feature of the watch (the dial) rubbing against the case. I have to imagine using this case full time will create long term wear and tear and null my warranty on my watch. Update: I sent it back and they shipped me another... Same exact problem. Sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jason Singer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, practical, good fit
customer_reviews.text: As a guy with big hands, I love how this case makes the Apple Watch look and feel bigger. I usually only wore 45mm and up watch cases, and the small 42mm was a little bit of a compromise. I also could only use the very last notch on the standard Apple band, but with this, I can use the 3rd or 4th notch because of the size. I’ve already gotten several compliments, and people are usually surprised at the low cost. Absolutely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Protects your watch. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in June for my 44mm Series 3, and I am quite satisfied. My job is very physical, and I punish every article of clothing I wear. My hands are constantly being banged against things, as are my wrists, and the watch has held up beautifully in this case. The only cons are those you would expect, and they’re ones you have to put up with to do what this watchband does: it is an extremely bulky band and case. It doesn’t prevent the use of the watch in any way, but you can feel it’s bulk on your wrist all the time. If you can get past that, then this band will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Blunderchief

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Case!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this for my Apple Watch. I work at UPS so I needed something that was going to protect my watch because we get banged up. This thing has held its own and gets plenty of compliments! I couldn’t be happier with this purchase and I’ve referred many friends! Thanks again for such an amazing case!
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I work at an industrial facility and was really concerned for my Apple-watch surviving until I saw this case, I also ordered the protective cover for my Apple-watch 3 and it fit good and secures it just like an Otter box case and cover for an I phone, the apple watch 3 will not fit in this band unless you order the 38mm clear protective cover
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Just received it in the mail, figured it best to buy a case since after 5 months of ownership I dropped my last one from waist high onto hardwood floors and the screen shattered. But it fits great, was easy to put on, and the heart rate monitor works fine. The bezel is a bit recessed, but I don’t spin it that often anyway so I don’t see a problem...will post a follow up in one month.
customer_reviews.author: Jody R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Protection But Too Bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this case. The watch band design is very cool, and rugged looking. Installing the watch was easy, and the case protects the watch all around--except for the face. Tempered glass protection will need to be applied, for face protection. However, the design of the case ensure that any flat surface isn't touching the watch. I didn't like the bulkiness of the case, and it made wearing the watch (with case) feel and look very over-sized. I also found that depressing and using the buttons on the side was more difficult than I would've liked.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R.Top Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing. It does the job very well. It keeps my Apple Watch secure to my wrist and with my lifestyle, it really keeps up with my daily activities without damaging the watch. I have already received many compliments on the stylish look, and it feels really good on the hand. I like that there are 2 holes to clasps to secure the wide band on my hand as it not only adds to the look, but also holds well on my wrist through my active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: BenFang2017

customer_reviews.title: Protective but...
customer_reviews.text: I am in construction so I needed a heavy duty case for my watch. This case seems to do the job, but I noticed the edges of my watch are getting scratched. Because this is the only case I use, I can only conclude it is the case itself that is scratching my watch. There also seems to be a lot of dust and dirt that gets under the case, so daily I am taking my watch out of the case to clean off all of the dirt. A protective case but there are probably better options out there
customer_reviews.author: Charlo

customer_reviews.title: Second one for my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new one to replace the old one. I am kinda tough on my watch so the band was breaking apart and I loved the old one so much I purchased a replacement. Works great, make sure you read the back side of the Apple Watch to get the correct size. The Watch just pops right it and stays in. Doesn't interfere with charging the Watch at all. I love that this band protects the front of the Watch against scratches too.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Verstappen

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: I have had Unicorn Beetle cases for my past three phones, so it was only logical that I tried this case when I finally went with the watch. It's a little bulky for everyday use, so I wear it when working in the garage or playing basketball. It's been impacted a couple of times and has protected the watch well. My only issue is that I have to wear it tight during basketball if I want the sensor to register heart rate. The case tends to raise the watch off my wrist a little too far. Aside from that small detail, I would recommend this case to anyone, along with Unicorn Beetle phone cases.
customer_reviews.author: G Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This watch isn’t really what it looks like it is in the picture... it isn’t high-end top of the line engineering. It’s basically a one-piece watchband that will work with your 42mm watch unit. The casing around the watch face and the wristbands are all attached and one single piece. I find that it works just fine, and in many cases more removable parts doesn’t work well for some people. If you need something to substitute for the cheap looking bands the watch comes with, this works great. If you’re looking for something more high end? Might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Mann

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed my watch
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first and then noticed my power button wasn’t working so I took off my case and noticed all this junk built up in the case which caused my buttons to freeze up and not work anymore. The watch barely fits inside the case so it’s hard to take in and out frequently to clean the case so I do not recommend this product unless you want to take off the case and clean it every few days you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Cadman Family

customer_reviews.title: great case but has its limits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my watch back in November. Looks sleek and worked like a charm until a couple of weeks ago when I crashed hard riding my mountain bike. I ripped up my back and arm and the case snapped along the power button headwall - but the watch did survive the brutal crash totally unscathed, so I can't complain too much. Overall a good product but definitely has a breaking point.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great if you work in a clean room environment ONLY.
customer_reviews.text: A good “watch case” and but missing major protections for the Apple Watch. There is no screen protection. There is no protection for dirt and dust which would scratch the touch screen and damage the watch body, hence the current rating. Water getting between the case and the body is also an issue. I have to return this product unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: DëV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the active farmer
customer_reviews.text: Choosing the right band for an active 14 y o involved a bit of research. I highly recommend this band for the active person. It dries quickly when wet. The bumper around the watch face is just high enough to prevent damage during the most challenging situations. My grandson has often mentioned how much he loves this band. He plays baseball, does farm work, washes cars and farm animals regularly and hasn’t had a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Good Band
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the info closer I thought this came with a built in screen protector. Thankfully I already had on on my watch so it wasn’t that big of a deal. This band is very durable though which is what I wanted. Looks good too. I did have to cut the bottom off where my roller dial is because it was hitting. But you can’t notice it and works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all hard rubber don’t wast your money even thought the price is good!
customer_reviews.text: This watch case and band is horrible. The band is not soft at all. It’s like hard plastic strapped around your wrist. Case pulls corners of screen protector causing it to peel off. Not even worth the cheap price. I guess this is what you get when you buy a cheap case/band. Went from breaking 3 catalysts bands to this. Won’t but the other ever again either. Will continue the search. !!
customer_reviews.author: smshookie

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: its okay... pretty thick as described. 1st problem we have found is that when we charge the watch it is to be on the charger very precisely, otherwise it doesn't fit right on the charger with this case on. 2nd problem is when my husband is working or outdoors the sweat gets trapped under the entire band, and under the watch itself so it causes some irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Sport and rugged protection for your watch.
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a $300 SmartWatch you should probably spend another $20 on a product like this to protect your purchase, it's a no brainer.. Now for the product, I actually like it a lot and it fits well, is very durable, only thing I wish it came with was a screen protector but it's no biggie. Also would be nice if the bands that come with it could be detached (not that the bands on it are not nice, i actually like them a lot.). Was it worth the money? Hell yeah lol
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Holds up in physical Altercations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case to keep your watch safe. I’m a hands on Officer meaning I fight with subjects 4 to 7 times a tour. My watch stays 100% safe plus the style looks Tacticool or like a G-Shock with I miss my G-Shocks but can’t live without my I-Watch. If you get physical in your work with other subjects this is the case for you. Just pull the trigger!!
customer_reviews.author: ZEN

customer_reviews.title: Good Balance
customer_reviews.text: There is a good balance of protection with a band that holds tight. The band is not water proof. I purchased 2 other bands that were water proof but had issues with the band and the side buttons being pushed all the time. I have had no issues with random button pushes with this band. The only down side is there is no built in screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for bigger wrists
customer_reviews.text: The SUPCASE [Unicorn Beetle Pro] Rugged Protective Case with Strap Bands for Apple Watch Series 3 arrived today. Pretty much as advertised. However the band could be a little longer as it’s a tight fit on my wrist. I bought this because it looked like a larger band and reviews said would fit large wrist. I you have a bigger wrist I suggest the carterjett xxl band it’s a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This has held up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I work with construction machinery and bang my watch into stuff all the time. The finish is wearing off on the watch a little, but it has not broken or cracked. Other than a bit of paint that has worn off, it still looks mostly new. It was hard to get the watch into the cover with a screen protector on, however. It may take a few tries because it is a tight fit and a flexible protector can get pulled up when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a watch band I am confident of and comfortable using!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this watchband and am very impressed. I’m really tough on watches and was worried about how to protect the Apple Watch , well, from me! Installation took just a minute and the protection looks impressive. I’m much more at ease wearing this full time every day now. Time will tell how durable it is, but the other reviewers say it holds up well. It’s large, provides great protection and the band is lightweight and secure. First impression - super product!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Pawleys

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a gift. Packaging was better than I expected. Product is as described, and actually looks better than I expected it to in person. Does not look cheap like I thought it would. Not as shiny as appears in the picture, more of a matte black, but otherwise seems durable and of good quality. I won't be personally wearing this so I have no input on comfort or longevity of durability. Happy with purchase for price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa R

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I loved this case.. this is truly a tough protector. I am a fireman and accidentally bang it on objects, corners, etc.. I even wear my watch into fires and the case holds up fine. I’d recommend to anybody.. my first case finally broke after a year of wearing 90% of the time, even at night.
customer_reviews.author: Agave Drinker

customer_reviews.title: Product Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for better protection during my everyday life as a soldier. This product fits snug and has a look that fits well in my uniform. Product Arrived on Time & Seems to be exactly as stated. Material feels very comfortable and durable. I’m not disappointed at all. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bk Vendoe

customer_reviews.title: Small issue
customer_reviews.text: It is a really great case and very comfortable. I’m not sure if the side button is supposed to be off center or not. It seems like it wouldn’t be but perhaps it is to make scrolling easier. Or I just got a defective one. Anyways, hopefully that’s ok and doesn’t mess up my watch, as it seems others have had the same problem. I will probably keep it for golf and stuff. The band is comfortable and secure and the size it adds is almost not noticeable surprisingly. I will update this review to 5 stars if I receive a replacement that doesn’t have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect fit for 42mm
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these Supcases for the iWatch that I have owned. First one lasted about 2 years and had no issues, except a small split started to develop on the band. I should add that the watch has a lot of all weather and underwater use so I was happy to say it was durable and a perfect fit for my series 2 watch @42mm. Buying the second one, which was a perfect fit again. Happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Band for Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had this band and Apple Watch Protector for 10 months. I work in Athletics so I needed a watch band that would be durable and protect my watch from all sorts of conditions. The band did not disappoint! My Apple Watch is still in like new conditions with zero scratches. I highly recommend this band for anyone that works in rough conditions, outdoors, or in active!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vinitelli

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one because I play racquetball and I didn’t want my iPhone to be smashed in case I get close to somebody has a boat to wind up it’s happened to my elbow but nevertheless it’s a great product and styles very easily very quickly wearing it is very comfortable and a somewhat stylish a very good product will be buying different colors in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I like it and wear it everyday. It doesn’t make your wrist stink, it’s comfortable, and it looks good. All that being said there’s one fatal flaw- it doesn’t lay flat. That one little detail may not affect everyone. It works fine with the standard Apple charger, but you have to turn it on its side. But for me, I use a wireless charging mat for this and my iPhone. I have to physically take it out of the band to use my mat every night. If the band was made of the same material as a OEM watch band, and still had the protective case-it would literally be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TarHeel0

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: All and all pretty good and does exactly what it says not to mention looks nice and rugged as well as being comfortable If this thing had a built in screen protector it would have really knocked it out of the park and that’s really my only complaint that being said it still worth a 5 star review but if you get this definitely invest in a good screen protector
customer_reviews.author: john wills

customer_reviews.title: Love this Apple watch case!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this watch case band as I was getting tired of the original sport band getting dirty and it was hard to keep clean in my line of work, and when it was dirty it was very noticeable. So I purchased this protective case for my Apple Watch and I am very impressed with the quality and design. My watch popped right in with no issues and I love the all black design with a little carbon fiber looking design on the sides. I had no issues charging the watch on my charge stand and the band slack holds well underneath the hold. Overall very pleased with my purchase and for the price, can’t beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this band so much. He had taken his watch off and left it on his tire. When he pulled out he accidentally ran over it. This band protected his apple watch, thank God! So of course I had to order another one. Great product and works just as great as those high dollar ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for almost a week and it definitely lives up to the reviews and expectations. No issues with the speaker or microphone. My only issue would be the ease of use for the dial. Still works fine but does rub a little and takes more effort then without the case. The band is stiff but I’m sure it will wear in and the same goes for when you’re adjusting the strap length. Overall well worth it for the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks different feels good
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't appear I am wearing an Apple Watch. This watch band separates me from others who are wearing the same kind of watch. It feels and looks good on my wrist. I haven't had it long enough to test durability but I bought products with the same name in the past that have held up to a known reputation. Looking forward too many years wearing this watch with this band.
customer_reviews.author: Night_Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great job protecting the watch
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying I love how well this thing protects the watch. I'm a clutz with my arms and my watches tend to get banged on things as I move around. The raised edge around the face coupled with a screen protector has done a great job protecting my (2nd) watch. Two cons: 1 - As seen in the pic, after 10 months the band is starting to break 2 - Sometimes I have difficulty getting it to charge on a charging dock. Bottom line: For the price, buying a new one is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend
customer_reviews.text: This case has survived through so many obstacles that it’s been through. Since this was a gift given to someone that works outside and they work with their hands a lot this case was a necessity. This case went through a lot and with all it went through the case it self still looks great and most importantly the watch it’s self is still intact it still looks brand new when you take off the case.
customer_reviews.author: angela alexander

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have It protecting my watch!
customer_reviews.text: This cover definitely makes me less nervous about breaking my watch face (like I did with my last Apple Watch, which is why I got This!). I barely Know it’s there, with one exception. Whenever it gets wet, like when I wash My hands, water gets between the face and the bottom of the cover, and the touch screen doesn’t work anymore. So I have To take it off, dry it, and put it back on which is annoying. Also, this is not a cover for rugged outdoor activities. I am an avid mountain biker, but I use a more rugged protector when I am biking. But all in all, I like It.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure Band for Big Dumb Animal Husbands
customer_reviews.text: (Do not take offense. He calls himself that when he breaks stuff!) Excellent, more secure band. Hubs watch we got him for Christmas had the Target HeyDay band break the first day, fall in the parking lot as he arrived at work, and got run over. So we got him this and a new watch for his bday and this is much more secure!
customer_reviews.author: MD Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the unicorn bettle products and have every apple product I own in their cases. I was skeptical of the watch but they pulled through as always. On a separate note the customer service is fast and trust worthy, they replaced a broken case I was shipped without questions asked and I am very grateful because the new one I received worked perfectly. Again, great brand with superior protective cases!
customer_reviews.author: Brady German

customer_reviews.title: Got my money’s worth!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for almost 2 years now and it has held up great. I use it daily from work and play. I’m an industrial electrician and so far the watch strap has held up really nicely protecting the Apple Watch from the occasional bumps and scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: Djbeez77

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought the expensive one from Catalina and this much better because the watch pushes in from bottom and held in extra by your wrist. The Catalina on split in half and had problems charging with silicon. It’s not a diving watch cover but works really good. I bought Liquipel for screen protection to use with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Land

customer_reviews.title: A watch frame that won’t die
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tough. It has a strong frame and durable watch band, I work a lot and this thing does pretty well on day one and it’s a tad hard to pop out the watch itself but it’s easy after you get used to it. I really love this and recommend it to anyone who works hard because this is tough I wish it had a screen protector though but that’s not bad compared to the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Once you figure out how to correctly snap the watch into it's holder, it functions very well. The buttons are easily accessible through the case and it does protect the watch. Cons: The physical watch band feels kind of hard, like plastic. It would be more comfortable if it were a softer rubber-like material.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Overall good. Little gripes (2)
customer_reviews.text: This case seems pretty durable. It definitely has a larger profile and I have people who notice it. I’ve been asked what type of watch I have now. Overall, it seems good! Two small gripes: it isn’t as comfortable as the stand band, and it took off a protective cover I had on the face. Getting it into the case is slightly violent.
customer_reviews.author: Triplejayee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months of normal use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a while but the side of it cracked and the silicon started coming off. Major bummer because I really liked this watch case/band. It does stink badly though if you don’t wash it often enough. Broke under normal daily use. Nothing extreme.
customer_reviews.author: DeetsMit

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear watches because I break them every time I do something. So my big dumb self thought to get an Apple Watch. This band/case is the only reason I wear it daily. It makes the watch look bigger which I like but it most definitely protects it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Botkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, rubs on skin
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Apple Watch case. It works great! I bump into a lot of things so the corners are slightly scratched but the case overall fits well, isn't too bulky, looks nice and doesn't hurt my skin. It does rub on my skin and leaves a mark but it doesn't hurt my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch band. I've been using my apple watch to the gym more and needed something to give it a little more protection around weights and everything else and this thing is perfect. Super easy to install in my opinion and does a really good job at protecting your apple watch from everything. It gets a little while to get used to though because it is a little bulkier and not as sleek but once you get used to it you'll love this. Great design and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Evan C

customer_reviews.title: Great watch band for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watchband for 1 and a half years. I am a full time plumber and previously worked in the hard scrape/land scape field. In both professions I would hit the watchband on hard surfaces and the band kept my watch safe. Recently the band started to crack apart but I have been rough on it and feel for the price that this watch band is well worth it. I will be purchasing this watchband again and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Great protective band
customer_reviews.text: Using this exclusively as the band for my Apple Watch Series 3. Working in a construction environment, this thing takes bumps and whacks constantly. It is showing a couple signs of wear but really nothing terrible. Has protected my screen great. I’d buy it again if it did break.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Super Rugged and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I am a tower engineer, building and climbing communication towers. In this photo we were doing some dirt work in the rain and my SUPcase kept my Apple Watch safe from all the elements. I’m very impressed with this product, but the only thing I can recommend is that they make it easier to turn the dial all the way around to turn off waterproofing on the watch. With the current design I have to take the watch out of the case to turn of this feature.
customer_reviews.author: SwaitMarketing

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy Watch Case
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty rough on my watches, therefore I needed a guard that could withstand my physical labor. This is my second Supcase that I’ve purchased. The first one lasted little over a year, and I have just finally replaced it. The only reason I replaced that one is because I accidentally cut the band, and over time it degraded the quality, to point the band broke off. That was my fault not the Supcase quality. I highly recommend this watch case for any Apple Watch users.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hauschildt

customer_reviews.title: The plastic shell breaks quite easily!
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted almost 4 months. When I ordered the case I was under the impression the case was a reinforced rubberized shell to absorb shock with just come ornamental colored plastic. I found out my beliefs in the shell construction was not correct. I took a spill while mountain biking and hit the concrete. When I got to my feet the Unicorn Beetle is now broken in three places and they are all where the plastic shell are barely held together with thin seems of rubber. If you actually need a protective case for your watch because you are truly active you may want to finde a more solidly constructed item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CASE EVER.  this cover has been in use for over 1 year, I’M VERY IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.text: I’M VERY VERY IMPRESSED. with the quality and durability of this product. I use this same case for OVER A YEAR, I work in the construction industry, this case has been exposed to thousands of situations considered heavy, the extremely hot and cold weather below 0 F '. I use this case everyday and I don't have any scratch on my screen, and I didn't use any screen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro F.

customer_reviews.title: Can trap dirt / other particles around the side button which can damage watch
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for my watch for a few months now. It provides great protection for the sides and screen on the watch and exposes the digital crown for ease of use. The band is pretty comfortable and secure. The look and feel remind me of the G-Shock series watches. The down side of this case is that it can allow dirt and other particles into the side button area and trap them there; which can increase the chances that the side button of the watch can become damaged and stuck. I've stopped using the case for my watch because of this, but if you clean out that area regularly, maybe it won't be as big of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the money, rugged!
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome for people who wear there Apple watches and work in them or do other activities that could cause harm. The raised edges keep you from cracking the glass and you can still put a screen protector on. The case fits perfect and the band is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Connor s.

customer_reviews.title: Works well !
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful watch case protector/watchband. I did not realize that the watch protector and the band do not separate. Very sturdy, but that makes the band quite ridged As a nurse, bump my Apple watch constantly this Gives great watch protection
customer_reviews.author: Chuck C.

customer_reviews.title: It protects my investment.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. It seems to be a nice quality. I have a nice size fingers so I don’t know how the touchscreen is going to work. Overall I like it. I will recommend it. My watch isn’t exposed anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Yep. This is what I need
customer_reviews.text: I love my iWatch 5 and I spent a lot of money for it. So there is not better way to take care of it than put on a nice tactical looking case. I work in law enforcement and there is always a risk for equipment damages but my iWatch is really protected on this case
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: Great case well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case as a work protector as I travel to Alaska and it gets tested vigorously. Everything holds up and is still as of now trailing on a year later the only issue I have is taking it in or out of the case if you have a screen protector is very easy and possible but tedious if you don’t want to damage it while doing so. It tends to lift at least one of the corners of the screen cover otherwise this thing is pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend requested this band for his Apple Watch. He loves it and thinks its very durable. He wasn't happyy about the delayed by 1 week shipment but he recommends it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Leonisha Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent I don’t know why I took so long to buy it. Protect your watch, they are actually expensive and for $20 is worth the protection. Trust me don’t wait until you actually brake the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple days it was resistant against bumps against tables. And not even a week into owning it, the case cracked near my scrollable button on my apple watch. And two days later i tried taking off my watch off my wrist and it broke in half. Pretty disappointed that it diddnt last a week.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Amato

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the shizzle! Yes, it costs more than many and more than Amazon suggestion comparable. This one has the strap holes much closer so you don’t have it too tight or too loose. The side wall near the bezel and crown are much more durable than those less expensive and is easy to switch out between other bands when going from work day to date night.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Dark green is not dark!
customer_reviews.text: The Dark green color is not dark at all! It is a brighter green and even two-tone between the band in the ring around the face of the watch. It is not close to military green, at all
customer_reviews.author: A. Swart

customer_reviews.title: Watch case cracked below the crown
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, very durable band design. My last one cracked under the crown which is the thinnest piece of material in the entire band. I bought a second one and it's been strong.
customer_reviews.author: derfynole

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: If you are rough on watches this if the perfect addition to your applewatch. It is just bulky. However, even after a year the band has held up and done well. Working in the yard, on vehicles, and even swimming is nothing for this band.
customer_reviews.author: C. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Appears will be effective in most situations to protect watch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install/remove watch. Appears will be effective protecting watch in most situations including impact to watch corner which shattered my prior iWatch. Screen face itself is not protected which I don’t see as a significant issue since the SUPCASE bezel extends beyond the watch face itself (if it falls face down, the impact will be to the SUPCASE rather than the watch face itself). ‘Rugged’ looking although watch can easily be removed from the SUPCASE in order to install a regular band for more formal events.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very good watch band
customer_reviews.text: I just upgraded from a series 1 to series 3 Apple Watch and purchased this band to protect it. I love it! Good quality and it does a fine job protecting the crystal. The Gold coating is starting to show wear and tear, so the next time I will probably get an all black one. The design is phenomenal, and I love the buckle. Easy to fasten and remove. Great band!
customer_reviews.author: davisg13

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my Apple Watch on a 5 day white water rafting camping trip in Utah. We rock climbed, biked, hiked, white water rafted, paddle boarded and I have to say this product is incredibly durable. The fact that it also looks good and feels comfortable are just added benefits. I am considering keeping it on for a while. It can definitely be work for outdoor activities as well as casually for dinners and a night out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Great ass case
customer_reviews.text: So far I have loved everything about this case. Protective easy to install and take off, the case is built well I have seen some reviews in reference to it breaking shortly after the first week but I normally dont abuse my actual watches. So really not sure how others have used the case. I use it only while at work and switch back to my usual bands once at home. Great case over all just wish it would protect the speaker holes so I say 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch band! Extremely durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: The band is really durable and I have not had any issues with it all. I wear it for everyday use and when I’m doing my workouts and PT. It’s comfortable enough to wear during exercise and outdoor activities. Liked it so much I bought one for my Pops and he loves it! I recommend this watch band for sure
customer_reviews.author: Arod760

customer_reviews.title: Great watch case for an unbeatable price. You won’t find one better.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this watch case for my series 3 since early November. It’s been on my arm everyday. I work in a prison and have a very active life style. There has never been a doubt that my watch is protected. I also use a screen protector for added security. It has some finish rubbing off but that’s expected for how much I wear it. It doesn’t interfere with the function of the watch in any way. It even works with my wireless charging stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan L.

customer_reviews.title: Look but don’t touch
customer_reviews.text: The look of it is good. It’s not comfortable to war at all the case it hugs your watch so tight that Digital Crown on the side doesn’t function correctly when scrolling so if you have the series 5 I don’t recommend, but works perfect with my series 3 tho
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Great watch protection
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my factory band when it began irritating my skin. This band is very functional and protects my watch from daily bumps. I’ve worn every day for the last 90 days in hot humid weather with issues or signs of wear. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manly watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it feels on my wrist. It has a little lip around the screen so it won’t get scratched if I ever happen to lay it face down. The only minor problem I have is that I can’t spin the side wheel easily but it’s not a huge deal. Other than that I really like the look. It gives it a manly look to the watch and that’s what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I work in the telecom field and have always worn G-Shocks, when I saw this case it made me look into iWatch. I honestly didn’t expect this case to be as good as it is. It has taken some pretty decent hits and not a scratch on my watch. Would highly recommend for someone who wants all the iWatch has to offer with the piece of mind you’re not going to destroy your watch working in less than optimal conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Breeezy

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. Fits great and looks good. My husband loves it. He works at a few concrete plants and it’s held up really well in those conditions. (he is in the office most of the time lol but its very dirty) still looks brand new and he’s had it for over a month. He uses it all the time. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, it is very durable, easy to put on and very affordable. I have spent much more on covers and they would get scratched up and were not as nice as this.
customer_reviews.author: Jvancil

customer_reviews.title: Durable case
customer_reviews.text: Some people were saying that it doesn’t charge or had issues with it ? Works fine charges fine with no issues happy with the case and it looks good 👌🏻.
customer_reviews.author: Serj Baghramian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for law enforcement
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend who is a deputy in the jail. He said he liked his Apple Watch but never wore it because he didn’t want to break it. He usually wears one of the ironMan watches so he is used to bulky watches. I got him this case and he wears his watch way more! He feels more confident with it on. It’s definitely bulky but I think it still looks nice on his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever and protects the watch case and face!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this band for a year and a half and it is doing an excellent job protecting my watch face and case. Not one scratch. And I work ten hour days in a warehouse and on a dock. And after all this time the band itself is a bit banged up of course but no cracks or rips or any actual damage to it. It’s so worth the money! It will go on for another year and a half I’m sure. And if it starts to smell like all rubber watch bands do, just make a paste of baking soda and take a toothbrush to it. Good as new!
customer_reviews.author: MrEddiesFather

customer_reviews.title: Band is Rugged and Protects My Watch
customer_reviews.text: I am really hard on watches and this band protects my Apple Watch ⌚️. Since the watch fits tightly in this band I was able to find a screen protector to protect the watch face. I highly recommend this band.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Snapcase Apple Watch band
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Apple Watch and it switched out and fit flawlessly. It doesn’t impede with any sort of use of the watch and provides some protection from daily activities. It looks good and is comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: DC 🐧

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought
customer_reviews.text: So bulky around the watch face you cannot slide your finger to use watch. Not what I expected and is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pastrygeek

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on large wrist !
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a band that makes the Apple Watch look good. I have large wrist and hands so the out of the box Apple Watch bands look girly on my wrist. This watch fits great and is comfortable. I even have 5 eyelets to spare on the watch band.
customer_reviews.author: BIGD1320

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some protection while at work. Paired with a screen protector this should handle nicely. Watch band is made out of a harder material. It has somewhat of a plastic feel. Not as comfortable as some other bands. Cheap case that works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

product_meta.title: SUPCASE [Unicorn Beetle Pro] Case for Apple Watch 3, Rugged Protective Case with Strap Bands for Apple Watch Series 3 2017 Edition [42mm, Compatible with Apple Watch 42mm 2015 2016 ] (Black)
feature_bullets: Specifically engineered to fit Apple watch 42 mm models (2015, 2016 and 2017 Release)
Full access to all watch features and functions
UB Pro bumper creates rugged shock absorption as well as raised bezel to protect screen from damage
UB Pro case includes scratch-resistant band for convenience and value. Apple Watch simply snaps into place.
Advanced front cover Snap-On design for easy installation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,194 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
